dialog.reportIssue: If the problem persists it is possible that the fault is in background services we're using. Feel free to contact support@metatavu.fi by email. Please include technical details in the email to speed up resolution of the problem.

visibility.fieldVisibility: The field is visible on the form:
visibility.conditionalFieldInfo: Select the form field that determines visibility.
visibility.conditionalFieldValueInfo: Select or enter the field value that determines the visibility.
visibility.fieldConditionLabel: This field appears, if {0} value is {1}
visibility.sectionConditionLabel: This section appears, if {0} value is {1}
visibility.selectVisibilityInfo: Select a field in the form to edit the field information.
visibility.tooltipDescription: Set conditions whether field is visible on form.
visibility.visibilityConditionTooltip:
The visibility condition determines the visibility of the field on the form. There can be several conditions for visibility, so when any condition is met, the field is visible on the form. 
 If the field's visibility also depends on the visibility of another field, the 'SHOW CONDITIONAL LINE' button can be used to view the condition line.
